So Far, I still like DBD. Killers, maps, gameplay & Contents/Events are great! I always watch pro players so that i still have interest on this game. Knowledge is the key. But I might still get bored here when I am in a bad mood. So yeah, you need focus & some knowledge to enjoy this game.

Are you a fan of sexy slashers and barefoot women with sharp objects? Like to get together with friends that will eventually move on to other games that don't form a toxic stockholm relationship with you? Do you feel the urge to gut another human, from belly to crotch, every now and then, or maybe get well acquainted with a well used rusty meat hook? Well then Dead by Daylight is the perfect game for you! Better learn to ignore your own racing heartbeat and run for your life because even with its few (many) bugs and flaws, DBD is genuinely a unique experience. Try not to take too much to heart and made sure you've got something fun to do afterwards if your matches go south.  Because you WILL die a lot...its kinda in the name

Dieses Spiel erfültte vor dem großen Update mein Leben. Es beglückte mich auf einer Ebene wie es sonst nur Krapfen mit Hiffenmarkmarmelade tuen. Nach dem Update änderte sich meine meinung leider. Nun esse ich lieber Rollmops als dieses Spiel zu spielen. Ich bin sehr enttäuscht! 99% Tunnler oder schwitzer. die reslichen 1% sind farmkiller. find ich abstoßend. ich hoffe ihr kehrt von der dunklen seite der macht ab und wendet dieses spiel wie pfannkuchen wieder auf die richtige bzw gute seite. Bis dahin leider unspielbar

你们到底在搞什么，我挂了加速器都没有办法进你们的服务器，能不能玩游戏还只能够看游戏的心情，cnmd，当时是为了魔王买了这个游戏，而且这里的建模也很好，可以看出来还是用心的，但是这个服务器问题是怎么回事，打游戏都好好的，偏偏登陆的时候一直出问题，你认真的吗？真的登录成不成功纯看脸？我就把话放在这里，把我的加速器搞得和摆设一样，每次突然想玩游戏了就要卸载重装，你告诉我这个原理是什么。等到我哪一天随时都能玩这游戏了，我才改成好评，老子登进去花的时间比你这个哈皮制作组的命还长

I have 504 hours on console and I'll say this game is more pvp than horror game. But the game is like an onion the more you play the more you learn about the game. It takes hundreds of hours to learn this game but it pays off with some of the most satisfying play I've had multiple different play style for both killer and survivor. Also 6.1.0 has mixed up the meta in a good way both killer and survivor don't have there tools they used to instead being retooled to new playstyles. Negatives such as nurse being the best killer and insane addons and pyramid head having a fun and skillful power but no addons to save his life. And in worst scenarios deathslinger having a mid tier power but terrible addons, Yet spirit gets some of the best addons in the game. Overall fun game to sink hours into

This is a very good game. The developer seems to listen to the community. I love how they constantly update their content and make it fun for everybody. I wish they allow the option to increase the game brightness a little bit more. There should be more game mode for example 2 killer and 8 survivors in a bigger map. That would be fun to play. Other than that, it is a good game to buy right now because the content is enough to keep you around for a long time. A+++

Please, for the love of God, do not download this game. You will fall into an endless downward spiral and you will never escape. Every game will destroy more and more of your brain cells until you become a mindless DBD player, stuck in an endless loop. I've already fallen victim to it, but you don't have to! Heed my warning, play something else like Doom or God of War.

0/5 crap. The devs should all be fired and banned from the video game industry. When you're a survivor, the killer perks and poor hit detection give the advantage to killers. When you're a killer, the survivors just spam the garbage game play mechanics with looping and pallets. It becomes a game of "exploit the horrible game design" instead of a fun game of skill.

Its one of my favorite game, i even made a tattoo of it. the only problem i see now is some killers are completly broken or OP........pay to win specially THE NEMESIS.

If you want survivors to quit this game, this is the best killer. It run soo damn fast, he can slash yourself over obstacle and pallets.........pallets will break by the way AND not only you get hit.......you get infected.........and there is 2 zombies roaming in the map that tracks you alot more when you are infected. I have been playing for years and yet this dumbass killer is still the same.   other than nemesis you could pick ghostface or the legion .....to just run insanely fast with the right perks. 

Its a great game but some killers are just completly broken......thats dead by daylight nemesis.   Remove AT»LEAST the slash attack would be enough DEVS.......seriously.
